Class CsvWriter

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.io.CsvIo
com.dua3.utility.io.CsvWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Flushable, AutoCloseable
public class CsvWriter extends CsvIo implements Flushable
A class that writes data in CSV format.

      public CsvWriter(BufferedWriter out, Arguments options)
      Constructs a new CsvWriter.
      Parameters:
      out - the BufferedWriter to write the CSV data to
      options - the Arguments object representing the options for writing CSV formatted data

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static CsvWriter create(BufferedWriter writer, Arguments options)
      Creates a new CsvWriter by using the provided BufferedWriter and Arguments options.
      Parameters:
      writer - the BufferedWriter to write the CSV data to
      options - the Arguments object representing the options for writing CSV formatted data
      Returns:
      a new CsvWriter instance

    • create

      public static CsvWriter create(Path path, Arguments arguments) throws IOException
      Creates a new CsvWriter by using the provided file path, Arguments options. The method reads the charset from the options and creates a BufferedWriter from the file path using the charset.
      Parameters:
      path - the path of the file to write the CSV data to
      arguments - the Arguments object representing the options for writing CSV formatted data
      Returns:
      a new CsvWriter instance
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • create

      public static CsvWriter create(OutputStream out, Arguments arguments)
      Creates a new CsvWriter by using the provided OutputStream and Arguments options. The method creates a BufferedWriter from the OutputStream using the charset from the options.
      Parameters:
      out - the OutputStream to write the CSV data to
      arguments - the Arguments object representing the options for writing CSV formatted data
      Returns:
      a new CsvWriter instance

    • addField

      public void addField(@Nullable Object obj) throws IOException
      Adds a field to the current row in the CSV writer. If this is not the first field in the row, a separator is added before the new field. The field value is converted to a string representation using the format method.
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to be added as a field in the CSV writer. This object will be converted to a string representation using the format method.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while writing the field to the CSV writer.

    • close

      public void close() throws IOException
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable
      Throws:
      IOException

    • flush

      public void flush() throws IOException
      Specified by:
      flush in interface Flushable
      Throws:
      IOException

    • nextRow

      public void nextRow() throws IOException
      Moves to the next row in the CSV writer. After calling this method, the writer will start writing fields to a new row. If the previous row had any fields, a line delimiter is added before moving to the next row. The fieldsInRow variable is reset to 0, indicating that the next field will be the first in the new row.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while moving to the next row in the CSV writer.
